fol.150r
Tho.
Bodeley./
Belgia 1591 21 May to M
r
Bodly
Belgia: 1591: May:
S
r
. As I wroate unto yowe this other daie that
I would sent unto yowe summ perticuler matters against sondry
of that Cuntrie for Carrieng of powder, munic
o
n, and victuels
into
Spaigne,
and the legate t ownes in
France,
to thend yowe
might charge the States thearew
th
, soe doe I heare inclosed send
the same unto yowe, althowgh manie more might be collected,
if anie would
s
rve to attend the same, uppon letters taken, &
confessions made heare.
And so for this time I Commend mee
to yowe vearie hartelie./ From my howse in Westm
r
this xxj
th
of Maie.
1591
Yo
r
vearie Loving frend./.
William Burghley
